title: tries an awkward url while trying to install submodule and then failure msg makes little sense
body:
I guess original problem boils to the problem in git (I think fix was never accepted upstream -- need to double check) but error msg (with #959 but might be also with master, don't know) points to us trying some awkwardly constructed url ('..../.git/submodule') which shouldn't happen:

``` shell
$> datalad search -d^ bids | xargs datalad get -n
2016-10-13 01:11:38,327 [INFO] Installing subdataset <Dataset path=/home/yoh/datasets.datalad.org/dicoms> in order to get /home/yoh/datasets.datalad.org/dicoms/dartmouth-phantoms/bids_test3 
...
2016-10-13 01:13:37,342 [WARNING] Target /home/yoh/datasets.datalad.org/openfmri/ds000203 already exists and is not an installed dataset. Skipped. 
2016-10-13 01:13:37,387 [ERROR] Failed to run ['git', '-c', 'receive.autogc=0', '-c', 'gc.auto=0', 'submodule', 'update', '--checkout', '--init', '--', u'ds000203'] under u'/home/yoh/datasets.datalad.org/openfmri'. Exit code=1. out= err=Submodule 'ds000203' (http://datasets.datalad.org/openfmri/.git/ds000203) registered for path 'ds000203'
| Cloning into '/home/yoh/datasets.datalad.org/openfmri/ds000203'...
| fatal: repository 'http://datasets.datalad.org/openfmri/.git/ds000203/' not found
| fatal: clone of 'http://datasets.datalad.org/openfmri/.git/ds000203' into submodule path '/home/yoh/datasets.datalad.org/openfmri/ds000203' failed
|  
2016-10-13 01:13:37,388 [ERROR] CommandError: command '['git', '-c', 'receive.autogc=0', '-c', 'gc.auto=0', 'submodule', 'update', '--checkout', '--init', '--', u'ds000203']' failed with exitcode 1.
| Failed to run ['git', '-c', 'receive.autogc=0', '-c', 'gc.auto=0', 'submodule', 'update', '--checkout', '--init', '--', u'ds000203'] under u'/home/yoh/datasets.datalad.org/openfmri'. Exit code=1. out= err=Submodule 'ds000203' (http://datasets.datalad.org/openfmri/.git/ds000203) registered for path 'ds000203'
| Cloning into '/home/yoh/datasets.datalad.org/openfmri/ds000203'...
| fatal: repository 'http://datasets.datalad.org/openfmri/.git/ds000203/' not found
| fatal: clone of 'http://datasets.datalad.org/openfmri/.git/ds000203' into submodule path '/home/yoh/datasets.datalad.org/openfmri/ds000203' failed
|  [cmd.py:run:367] (CommandError) 
```

it does succeed on a rerun:

``` shell
(git)hopa:~/datasets.datalad.org/labs/haxby[master]git
$> datalad search -d^ bids | xargs datalad get -n
2016-10-13 01:14:16,756 [INFO] Installing subdataset <Dataset path=/home/yoh/datasets.datalad.org/openfmri/ds000203> in order to get /home/yoh/datasets.datalad.org/openfmri/ds000203 
2016-10-13 01:14:20,486 [INFO] Installing subdataset <Dataset path=/home/yoh/datasets.datalad.org/openfmri/ds000204> in order to get /home/yoh/datasets.datalad.org/openfmri/ds000204 
2016-10-13 01:14:21,736 [INFO] Installing subdataset <Dataset path=/home/yoh/datasets.datalad.org/openfmri/ds000205> in order to get /home/yoh/datasets.datalad.org/openfmri/ds000205 
2016-10-13 01:14:23,278 [INFO] Installing subdataset <Dataset path=/home/yoh/datasets.datalad.org/openfmri/ds000206> in order to get /home/yoh/datasets.datalad.org/openfmri/ds000206 
2016-10-13 01:14:24,692 [INFO] Installing subdataset <Dataset path=/home/yoh/datasets.datalad.org/openfmri/ds000208> in order to get /home/yoh/datasets.datalad.org/openfmri/ds000208 
Tried to get 5 files. Got 5. 
/home/yoh/datasets.datalad.org/openfmri/ds000203 ... ok.
/home/yoh/datasets.datalad.org/openfmri/ds000204 ... ok.
/home/yoh/datasets.datalad.org/openfmri/ds000205 ... ok.
/home/yoh/datasets.datalad.org/openfmri/ds000206 ... ok.
/home/yoh/datasets.datalad.org/openfmri/ds000208 ... ok.
```
